data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santschi, F. (1914): Formicidae. Voyage de Ch. Alluaud et R. Jeannel en Afrique Orientale (1911 - 1912). Résultats scientifiques. Hyménoptères 2: 41-148, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/8111/8111.pdf
